effect.diamond_pearl: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.platinum: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.
flavor_text.platinum: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.
